Name: team_size_within_limit
Description: Keep team size within acceptable bounds

Name: ensure_worker_availability
Description: Ensure workers assigned have sufficient availability

Name: cap_sprint_backlog_tasks
Description: Cap the number of tasks per sprint backlog

Name: allow_only_active_sprints
Description: Only consider sprints with acceptable status

Name: limit_total_effort_in_sprint
Description: Limit total effort scheduled in a sprint backlog

Name: reduce_blocker_severity
Description: Keep average blocker severity low across tasks

Name: keep_review_duration_reasonable
Description: Ensure sprint review duration remains reasonable

Name: require_po_availability
Description: Require Product Owner availability for planning and reviews

Name: keep_planning_duration_within_limit
Description: Keep sprint planning within a timebox

Name: prioritize_user_stories_above_threshold
Description: Ensure selected user stories meet a priority threshold

Name: limit_feature_priority_spread
Description: Limit very low-priority features from entering near-term plan
